text: "Who Let the Dogs Out" is a 2000 song by Bahamian band Baha Men. It gained popularity after being used in the movie Rugrats in Paris: The Movie and its soundtrack. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, Scotland and Ireland, number 1 in New Zealand and Australia, number 40 in the United States, number 14 in Canada and number 4 in the Netherlands. == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Baha Men songs
title: Who Let the Dogs Out
